name: Manifest
description: A short description to be shown below the app name with a promotional text
descriptionShort: A long description explaining what the app does or talking about your business.

MoreContent_ThisIsOptional.title: A text section with more content about the app
MoreContent_ThisIsOptional.data: Free text with more content about the app. It will be shown below the long description section.

Advantages_ThisIsOptional.title: You can also create a item list section

AsMuchAsYouNeed_ThisIsOptional.title: The title of another text section
AsMuchAsYouNeed_ThisIsOptional.data: You can add as much content as you need. It can also be a list, just change the 'type' property and use an array here as shown above.

AsMuchAsYouNeedToo_ThisIsOptional.title: The title of another section
AsMuchAsYouNeedToo_ThisIsOptional.data: You can add as much content as you need. It can also be a list, just change the 'type' property and use an array here as shown above.

resources.title: The 'type' property changes the resource icon on AppCatalog
A PDF file (the optional 'fileType' property makes it open inside AppCatalog without redirect)
A Markdown file (the optional 'fileType' property makes it open inside AppCatalog without redirect)
App internal doc (MAY be a pdf or markdown with the 'fileType' property)
